Description: You attempt to throw a creature into the ground with tremendous force. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit, deal an amount of fighting damage equal to + the user's level. Seismic Toss results in a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4+Level at level 5, 1d12+Level at level 10, and 4d4+Level at level 17.
